title: Claims and Policy Platform Modernization
heroDescription: We rebuilt legacy policy, claims, and reporting systems into a secure cloud-ready platform with automated workflows.
scopeItems: Custom workflow system for policy issuance and claims lifecycle
Role-based access control and encrypted data management
API integrations for payments, SMS, and customer notifications
Automated reporting dashboards for operations and compliance
Performance tuning and long-term support model
challenge: The client was operating with fragmented legacy tools that slowed approvals, claims processing, and reporting across teams.
solution: We designed a centralized platform with secure role-based workflows, automated status transitions, and unified reporting.
outcome: Claims turnaround improved, manual dependency dropped significantly, and leadership gained real-time visibility into operations.

title: Coffee Supply Chain Platform
heroDescription: We connected warehouse telemetry, order workflows, and partner coordination into one unified operational platform.
scopeItems: Supplier, roasting unit, and distribution center workflow modules
IoT-based temperature and storage telemetry for stock quality
Real-time dispatch dashboard with SLA and delivery tracking
Automated notifications for operations teams and partners
Cloud deployment with monitoring and support-ready runbooks
challenge: Operations data lived in disconnected tools, causing delays in dispatch and limited visibility into inventory quality.
solution: We built a unified operations system with telemetry pipelines, workflow automation, and SLA-based dispatch orchestration.
outcome: Teams achieved faster dispatch coordination, stronger quality tracking, and better communication across supply chain partners.

title: Real-Time Asset Tracking and Alerts
heroDescription: We delivered an end-to-end IoT monitoring platform with sensor integrations, live dashboards, and escalation workflows.
scopeItems: Device onboarding and secure telemetry ingestion across multiple sites
Cloud data pipeline with anomaly detection and threshold-based alerts
Ops dashboards for asset health, uptime, and failure trends
Escalation workflows with SMS and email notifications
Maintenance analytics and periodic performance optimization

title: Infrastructure Modernization with CI/CD
heroDescription: Mind Manthan migrated legacy deployments to cloud-native pipelines with release automation and production-grade monitoring.
scopeItems: Cloud migration planning, environment hardening, and infra-as-code setup
CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and production deployment
Containerization strategy with rollback-ready release workflows
Centralized logging, metrics dashboards, and SLA alerting
Cost optimization and uptime improvements through architecture tuning
challenge: Manual release processes and unstable infrastructure were slowing delivery and increasing incident risk.
solution: We implemented IaC, CI/CD, container workflows, and observability with guardrails for reliable deployments.
outcome: Release velocity improved while production stability and cloud cost control became predictable.

title: Multi-System API Integration Hub
heroDescription: We unified fragmented third-party integrations into a secure API orchestration layer with monitoring and audit-ready logs.
scopeItems: Custom middleware for payment, CRM, ERP, and communication APIs
Token management, rate limiting, and encrypted payload handling
Real-time retries, queueing, and fallback logic for resilience
Centralized integration dashboard with webhook traceability
Operational runbooks and support model for long-term stability
challenge: The integration ecosystem became hard to maintain due to inconsistent contracts and vendor-specific edge cases.
solution: We built a standardized orchestration layer with resilient retries, monitoring, and contract governance.
outcome: Integrations became easier to operate, incidents dropped, and onboarding of new partners accelerated.
